trans-unit.source: Performs data binding of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"></xref> Web server control within a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: Executa o enlace de dados de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"> </xref> Web controlo server dentro de um designer visual.

trans-unit.source: The ListControlDataBindingHandler class performs design-time data binding of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe de ListControlDataBindingHandler efetua o enlace de dados de tempo de criação de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: The ListControlDataBindingHandler class is referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: A classe de ListControlDataBindingHandler é referenciada por <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>utilizando a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler.DataBindControl%2A> method performs the design-time data binding.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler.DataBindControl%2A>método efetua o enlace de dados do momento da concepção.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler.DataBindControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler> class when the class is referenced by a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework constrói internamente uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler>classe quando a classe é referenciada por um <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute>atributo.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler>

trans-unit.source: Performs data binding on the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Executa o enlace de dados no controlo especificado.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> control that is specified by `control` has a data source specified within its <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataBindingsAccessor.DataBindings%2A> property, the DataBindControl method clears the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, and then adds a string message indicating that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> is data bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>controlo especificado pelo `control` tem uma origem de dados especificada dentro da respetiva <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataBindingsAccessor.DataBindings%2A>propriedade, o método DataBindControl limpa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>coleção do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>e, em seguida, adiciona uma mensagem de cadeia que indica que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>estão vinculado a dados para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataBindingsAccessor.DataBindings%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> for the document that contains the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> para o documento que contém o controlo.
